date.description: The date of the report data

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign

adGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group

adGroupName.description: The name of the ad group

grossImpressions.description: Total number of impressions before invalid traffic removal

grossClicks.description: Total number of clicks before invalid traffic removal

validImpressions.description: Number of valid impressions after invalid traffic removal

validClicks.description: Number of valid clicks after invalid traffic removal
